release_notes.en-US:
Version 1.0.6.5
- Necessary updates for compatibility with Thunderbird 6.0
- Bugfix: Fixed configuration for all announced locales :-)
- Added the following locales (thanks to all the poeple who contributed)
       ca-AD: Catalan by Opakoman,rubenix
       cs-CZ: Czech by Joelp
       de: German by BirthdayReminder
       es-ES: Spanish by chuzo
       hu-HU: Hungarian by Cashman       
       it-IT: Italian by Underpass
       ko-KR: Korean by wtspout
       nl: Dutch by markh
       pt-PT: Portugese by lloco
       sk-SK: Slovak by Branislav Rozbora
       vi: Vietnamese by longnh

description.en-US:
Birthday Reminder shows a list of upcoming birthdays for all contacts in Thunderbird's address book. The date of birth of a contact has to be provided in the custom fields of the contact data ("Custom1" by default, configurable). If a date of birth is provided in this field, the contact's name is added to the list along with the number of days until the birthday and the age of the contact. 

If you use the Thunderbird calendar extension ("Lightning"), Birthday Reminder will create events for the birthdays of your contacts. You can choose the calendar you want to have the events in. Reminders are supported. 

As of version 1.0.6.4, you can even use Google Calendar (with the Google Calendar Provider extension)... :-)

* PLEASE DO NOT POST PROBLEM REPORTS HERE. Write an eMail to birthdayreminderbeta@googlemail.com instead. All Problem reports posted here will be ignored. *

developer_comments.en-US: Hi all, * Do you want to support the development of BirthdayReminder? I will not have a lot of time in the next year because I am starting a new job. This is why I am looking for people who are interested in helping to enhance BirthdayReminder. If you are interested please mail to birthdayreminderbeta@googlemail.com. * PLEASE DO NOT POST PROBLEM REPORTS HERE. Write an eMail to birthdayreminderbeta@googlemail.com instead. All Problem reports posted here will be ignored. * If you can provide a translation into your language, I would appreciate it if you do so at http://www.babelzilla.org. * If you would like to become beta-tester, for example for testing BirthdayReminder with new Thunderbird versions, then send an eMail to birthdayreminderbeta@googlemail.com. Regards, Sebastian

summary.en-US: Birthday Reminder reminds of upcoming birthdays for all contacts in Thunderbird's address book. Supports Lightning, reminders and even Google Calendar :-)
